sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { View, StyleSheet, Text } from 'react-native';

const StatBox = (props) => {
    return(
        <View style={styles.statBox}>
                <Text style={styles.text}>
                    {props.name}
                </Text>
                <View style={styles.numBox}>
                    <Text style={styles.text}>
                        0
                    </Text>
                </View>
            </View>
    )
}

function CharacterWindow(props) {
    return (
        <View style={[styles.container]}>
            <View style={styles.statBox}>
                <Text style={styles.text}>
                    str
                </Text>
                <View style={styles.numBox}>
                    <Text style={styles.text}>
                        0
                    </Text>
                </View>
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.text}>
                    dex
                </Text>
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.text}>
                    con
                </Text>
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.text}>
                    int
                </Text>
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.text}>
                    wis
                </Text>
            </View>
            <View>
                <Text style={styles.text}>
                    cha
                </Text>
            </View>
        </View>
    );
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {
        flex: 1,
        flexDirection: 'row',
        backgroundColor: '#404040',
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'space-evenly',
        width:'100%',
        height:'100%',
      },
    text: {
        color:'#fff',
        fontSize:"20px"
    },
    statBox: {
        backgroundColor:'#29293d',
        width: '100px',
        height:'100px',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        alignItems:'center',
        borderColor: 'white',
        borderWidth: '2px',
        padding:'10px',
        marginTop:'10px'
    },
    numBox: {
        backgroundColor:'#404040',
        borderRadius:'5px',
        borderColor: 'white',
        borderWidth: '2px',
        padding: '10px',
        margin: '10px',
    }
})

export default CharacterWindow;
